p: Euphorbia balsamifera (family Euphorbiaceae) has a broad spectrum of medicinal properties: The latex of Euphorbia balsamifera is effective as a pulpal devitalizing agent ( Yam, A. A., Gaye, F., Dieme, F. A., Bassene, E., & Ba, 1997), the plantâ€™s leaves, stems and roots showed antimicrobial activities against some pathogenic microorganisms ( Kamba and Hassan, 2010), and the methanol extract of the plant showed wound healing activity ( Ahmed et al., 2016).
